# rPackagesRte

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of rPackagesRte is to build static site to display informations about `R packages` manage by [rte-antares-rpackage oranisation](https://github.com/rte-antares-rpackage)


# build site

